.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Status(valuetype MailKit.StatusItems items, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed

Docs.summary: Update the values of the specified items.

remarks.para: Updates the values of the specified items.
The method MUST NOT be used on a folder that is already in the opened state. Instead, other ways of getting the desired information should be used.

For example, a common use for the method is to get the number of unread messages in the folder. When the folder is open, however, it is possible to use the method to query for the list of unread messages.
